TopicTitle: Solar panels extended during upgrade locked open

Articles.Content:
Hey all,

Not s show stopper, but a little annoying given the number of craft I have getting around.

My issue is that after the last update, most of the solar panels on craft I had in flight no longer show the button to retract.

This only seems to be for craft which had the panels extended at the time of the upgrade, and only seems to effect this type of panel.

Thinking I might need to edit somewhere to modify or replace the part. Did anyone else get this, and/or know of a solution?

Thanks

That's expected behavior, one of the changes in 1.0.x is that the standard panels don't retract, only the heavier shielded panels do.

To revert to the previous behavior, go into your KSP folder, then Gamedata/Squad/Parts/Electrical. In there are two folders, 1x6SolarPanels and 3x2SolarPanels. In each of those, edit the file ending in ".cfg" and delete the line "retractable = false", then save the file.
